content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Box the Ears The target is deafened until healed. Bludgeoning
Javelin Catcher Triple damage if the attack was ranged or thrown attack. Double damage for all other attacks. Piercing
Lip Cut The target must succeed at a DC 5 flat check to cast spells with a verbal component until healed. Slashing
Call of the Wild Triple damage to animals, beasts, and fey. Double damage to all other creatures. Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #36
